1.0.1.name: wordpress/zeenshare
1.0.1.description:
ZeenShare lies on a mere idea : make your life easier. That's why our portal enables you to annotate your collaborative documents whether it is a text or not : you can upload .ppt extensions as well as pdf documents of images.

ZeenShare is a portal to save time and reduce bulk e-mails. Use it to collaborate with your co-woworkers or your client.

Zeenshare wordpress plugin adds to your site the opportunity to registered accounts to put documents directly in your zeenshare domain, without having to login again.
